metadata.title: CVE-2024-55634 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability in Drupal Core allows Privilege Escalation.This issueaffects Drupal Core: from 8.0.0 before 10.2.11, from 10.3.0 before 10.3.9,from 11.0.0 before 11.0.8.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
